:v-model.description: Bind the input box to search for a value in both directions
:v-model.description_zh: 双向绑定输入框搜索值

clearabled.description: Whether to enable the purge control

focus.description: Whether or not to get focus automatically

showAction.description: Whether to display the right control (the "Search" button on the right)
showAction.description_zh: 是否显示右侧控件(右侧的"搜索"按钮)

actionStyle.description: The style of the control on the right, in the form of an object
actionStyle.description_zh: 右侧控件的样式，对象形式

inputAlign.description: Horizontal alignment of input box content
inputAlign.description_zh: 输入框内容水平对齐方式

inputStyle.description: Customize the input box style, object form
inputStyle.description_zh: 自定义输入框样式，对象形式

disabled.description: Whether to enable the input box

borderColor.description: Border color, if the color is configured, there will be a border
borderColor.description_zh: 边框颜色，配置了颜色，才会有边框

searchIconColor.description: The color of the search icon is the same as the font color of the input box by default
searchIconColor.description_zh: 搜索图标的颜色，默认同输入框字体颜色

searchIconSize.description: Search for the size of the icon

color.description: Enter the font color of the input box

searchIcon.description: The icon on the left side of the input box can be the uView icon name or the image path
searchIcon.description_zh: 输入框左边的图标，可以为uView图标名称或图片路径

margin.description: The distance between the component and other elements on the top, bottom, left, and right, in the form of a string with units, such as "30rpx", "30rpx 20rpx", etc
margin.description_zh: 组件与其他上下左右元素之间的距离，带单位的字符串形式，如"30rpx"、"30rpx 20rpx"等写法

animation.description: Whether to enable animation, see the instructions above
animation.description_zh: 是否开启动画，见上方说明

value.description: Enter the initial value of the field

maxlength.description: The maximum length that can be entered in the input field, -1 is the unlimited length
maxlength.description_zh: 输入框最大能输入的长度，-1为不限制长度

height.description: Enter the height of the box, in rpx

label.description: Search for text messages on the left

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the content of the input box changes
events.description_zh: 输入框内容发生变化时触发

events.name: search
events.description: Triggered when the user determines the search, when the user presses enter, or when the search key is in the lower right corner of the phone's keyboard
events.description_zh: 用户确定搜索时触发，用户按回车键，或者手机键盘右下角的"搜索"键时触发

events.name: custom
events.description: Triggered when the user clicks on the right control
events.description_zh: 用户点击右侧控件时触发

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggers when the input box gains focus
events.description_zh: 输入框获得焦点时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: When clearabled is configured, this event is emitted when the content is emptied
events.description_zh: 配置了clearabled后，清空内容时会发出此事件

events.name: click
events.description: When disabled is true, click the input box to send this event to jump to the search page
events.description_zh: disabled为true时，点击输入框，发出此事件，用于跳转搜索页

events.name: clickIcon
events.description: Triggered when the icon on the left is clicked
